SEARCH
Package com.dhk.window

Class ViewRefresher

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.window.ViewRefresher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ViewRefresher extends Object implements Runnable
This class starts a view refresher on a new thread. When the thread is running, the frame of the application is refreshed at a given interval.
Version:
1.3.2
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewRefresher

      public ViewRefresher(DhkView view, int interval)
      Constructor for the ViewRefresher class.
      Parameters:
      view - - The view for the application.
      interval - - The interval at which to refresh the view in milliseconds.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method creates and starts a new thread for this runnable to run on.

    • run

      public void run()
      This method starts running this runnable. It updates the given frame at every given interval.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • suspend

      public void suspend()
      Suspend the view refresher.
